name: Houston

authority.name: ParkHouston Parking Management Division
authority.authority_name: City of Houston ParkHouston (Parking Management Division)
authority.serves_description: Most City of Houston parking citations are issued and processed through ParkHouston, the city's Parking Management Division.

visual_markers: HX, P or V prefix near the citation number
citation_pattern.notes: City citations often begin with prefixes HX, P or V as indicated on the ParkHouston payment site; numbers follow the prefix【222206061973774†L252-L257】.

appeal_address.missing_reason: ParkHouston allows online or in-person hearings; a mailing address for Phase‑1 appeals is not published and must be confirmed.

submission_methods.notes: You may contest your citation online within seven days via the HoustonParking T2 portal or in person at the Parking Adjudication Office within 30 days; the city does not provide a mailing address for initial hearings【222206061973774†L252-L272】.

phone_confirmation.purpose: Confirm that there is no mailing address for ParkHouston Phase‑1 appeals and verify contest procedures.

verification.source_note: ParkHouston’s resolve a citation page provides contest timelines and contact details but does not list a mailing address【222206061973774†L252-L272】.

official_confirmation_purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.
qa_blocking_issues: ParkHouston does not publish a mailing address for Phase‑1 appeals; confirmation by phone is required.
qa_known_gaps: Houston Police Department routing to ParkHouston needs confirmation.
University of Houston, Houston Christian University, University of Houston-Downtown and UH-Clear Lake sections missing confirmed mailing addresses for appeals.
